name: Aril Backpack Red Alert
name_cn: 伪壳 背包 红色警戒
description:
Item Type: Medium Backpack
Carrying Capacity: 85K µSCU
Core Compatibility: Medium & Heavy
 
Originally designed for miners, the Aril armor comes with an attachable backpack that can accommodate a variety of tools and supplies to keep your hands free. The Aril backpack is available in a variety of vibrant colors to fit your personal taste and for easy identification on the jobsite.
description_cn:
物品类型：中型背包
储物空间：85K µSCU
可适配胸甲：中型&重型
 
最初为矿工而设计的伪壳盔甲附带一个可拆卸的背包，可以容纳各种工具和补给，解放您的双手。伪壳背包提供了多种可选的鲜艳颜色，满足您个人喜好同时，还便于在工作场合识别身份。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-FPSWeaponsArmor
